alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 2:27PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, except 4 to 8 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Centennial Mountains and Island Park region, including but not limited to Raynolds Pass, Targhee Pass, Island Park, and Ashton Hill. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to falling and blowing snow. Morning and evening commutes may be significantly impacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
